name: Fokusiro
description:
Everyone wants your time, because it's the only valuable currency in todays rushed world. Distractions are everywhere.  Face them and fight honorably to reach the state of flow or end up doomed at the bottom of procrastination food chain.

Developed for LudumDare44 for theme Your life is a currency the game is short casual experiment inspired by Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice. While the actual gameplay is wastly different (not to mention producion qualities), I believe that both boil down to simple observation and reaction at the right time as well as planning your actions beforehand based on the situation. I let player be the judge of whether I managed to recreate similarly skill-based, potentially frustrating but ultimately rewarding experience.
